Google Inc. may be returning to its startup roots. "A lot of the growth of the company used to be driven by innovation," said Yun Kim, an analyst at investment firm Gleacher& Co. Having someone with the very strong products background that Larry has could bring some innovation back to Google Inc. . Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain as executive chairman and will advise Page and Sergey Brin , Google Inc. 's other co-founder. "Whether it was Michael Vick or Brett Favre ," said Sean McManus , trying to explain this NFL viewership phenomenon. I think all of it generated interest...[ and] brought in a lot of people who wouldn't normally watch football. Sean McManus added that once curiosity is piqued, the games must be compelling enough to hold viewer interest. And most of them were. to write his own songs for his debut album. According to The Mirror, Simon Cowell has approved the singer's request to pen his own tracks for the upcoming LP. A source said: Simon Cowell and Matt Cardle spoke over Christmas and texted ideas about what Matt Cardle wants to do. Simon Cowell has said that he wants him to write and co-write some songs. "They know they want great material, if the songs are penned by Matt Cardle then even better. He's chuffed.
